Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the Black Panther Party created the WIC program.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Black Panther Party created the WIC program without providing substantial evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert suggests that there is an alternative account of how WIC came about, which challenges the claim that the Black Panther Party created the program.
Contradict fact: The expert's investigation found no evidence to support the claim that the Black Panther Party operated a program called WIC or that it had any close resemblance to the USDA program.
Falters at times: The claim falters by making an unsupported assertion about the origin of the WIC program.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the role of the Black Panther Party in the creation of the WIC program.
